document_data.name: Sharthane Zul
document_data.mainbody: '''Sharthane Zul''' was the [[human]] high [[priest]] of [[Cyric]] who presided over the [[House of Cyric (Bezantur)|House of Cyric]] in [[Bezantur]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. As the most influential member of the [[church of Cyric]] in [[Thay]], he was one of the most powerful individuals in that realm as of the late 1360s DR. His influence was said to rival that of the [[zulkir]]s.
document_data.Personality: He was a masterful politician as well as suspected of being both a sadist—amusing himself with a private underground torture chamber—and a masochist—known to willingly give up his life energies in exchange for sexual favors from a [[succubus]].
document_data.Activities:
Sharthane presided over the largest congregation of Cyric-worshipers in all of Thay at the House of Cyric. He lived on the temple grounds in a personal mansion, which was opulent enough to have been the home of a king. He had hundreds of personal [[slave]]s.

He was known to traffic with [[tanar'ri]] for information and entertainment.
document_data.History: During the ongoing Thayan civil conflicts of the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century DR, Sharthane was careful to maintain neutrality lest his political power be tested by the [[Red Wizards]].
